name: Sandbox Reimagined (Halo 3)
description:
Sandbox Reimagined (Halo 3) is a playable environment featuring the iconic Sandbox map from Halo 3. Developed inside of Unreal Engine, players can expect a similar experience to modern Halo games, with some additions here and there. Included within this package are fan-favorite mechanics such as the Bubble Shield and Man Cannon. Explore this strange environment and uncover the mystery of what the Shrine Defenders are protecting.
